SEARCH
Package view.gui

Class ShelvesController

java.lang.Object
view.gui.ShelvesController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ShelvesController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the shelves scene showing the four shelves of the players.

    • ShelvesController

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Method called to load the scene with the shelves of the players in game. The shelves are filled with the items of the players. The scene changes depending on the number of players in game.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • fillShelf

      private void fillShelf(Shelf shelf, int playerIndex)
      Method used to calculate the position of the image of the item on the shelf. Puts the images of the shelf calling the method putImageOnScene.
      Parameters:
      shelf - shelf of the player
      playerIndex - index of the player. Used to know which shelf to fill

    • putImageOnScene

      private void putImageOnScene(String imageName, int y, int x, int height, int width, int offsetX, int offsetY, int stepX, int stepY)
      Puts an image on the scene
      Parameters:
      imageName - Name of the image.
      y - Value of the y coordinate in the shelf.
      x - Value of the x coordinate in the shelf.
      height - Height of the image.
      width - Width of the image.
      offsetX - Offset of the x coordinate.
      offsetY - Offset of the y coordinate.
      stepX - Step of the x coordinate.
      stepY - Step of the y coordinate.
